title.rendered: Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Mr. Holger K. Nielsen

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Mr. Holger K. Nielsen, Special Representative for Denmark’s candidature to the UN Security Council (2025-2026) on Wednesday, 6th March, 2024.

The visiting Danish Envoy was in the country to solicit Nigeria’s support for Denmark’s candidature to the Non-Permanent Seat of the UNSC (2025-2026)
